overview:
Alex Glass CIO

Alex Glass manages the entire lifecycle of thePlatform’s systems and networks, defining quality goals to constantly improve our services’ reliability and scalability. Before becoming the VP of Operations, Alex Glass worked with thePlatform as a Solutions Architect, the Director of Customer Service, and the VP of Client Services. Prior to joining thePlatform, Alex was with Digeo, Inc. where he worked as both a Project and Program Manager responsible for the deployment of an interactive television (iTV) personal video recorder.
